name: wheather_app
description: [3;5~This project is a user-friendly weather dashboard created using Express and Node.js on the server-side, and EJS along with CSS for the client-side rendering. It utilizes the Axios HTTP client to interact with a public weather API, enabling users to retrieve and view real-time weather data for any location globally. The dashboard displays weather conditions, temperature, humidity, wind speed, and other relevant weather information in an easy-to-understand format. The project aims at demonstrating a practical understanding of integrating public APIs into web projects, server-side programming with Express/Node.js, client-server communication using Axios, and data manipulation and presentation
author: Manuel Vera
